installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Installation Script
#
## Define script variables
export HOME=/mnt/server

## Install dependencies
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip libstdc++6 lib32gcc1 ca-certificates libsdl2-2.0-0:i386 telnet

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
chown -R root:root /mnt

## Install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## Create local database config
echo "writing server database config"
cat <<EOT > $HOME/config_local.cs
\$cm_config::DB::Connect::server =   "${SQL_SERVER}:${SQL_PORT}";     // server IP or domain name. Can enter port if it is not default
\$cm_config::DB::Connect::user =     "${SQL_USER}"; // MUST be a user with ROOT privileges in order to create new DBs
\$cm_config::DB::Connect::password = "${SQL_PASSWORD}"; // password for that user
EOT

## Create telnet config
if ! grep -q "$telnet::bindAddress" "$HOME/main.cs"; then
    echo "adding telnet config to main.cs"
    echo "" >> $HOME/main.cs
    echo "\$telnet::bindAddress = \"127.0.0.1\";" >> $HOME/main.cs
    echo "telnetSetParameters(${TELNET_PORT}, \"${TELNET_PASSWORD}\", \"${TELNET_PASSWORD}\", false);" >> $HOME/main.cs
fi
